sentences.sContent: In each one of these places you will find a microcosm of molecules which directly impact the look, smell, touch, and sound of everything that you see.
sentences.sContent_eng: In each one of these places you will find a microcosm of molecules which directly impact the look, smell, touch, and sound of everything that you see.
sentences.sCn: 在每一个这样的地方，你都可以发现分子的微观世界，它们会直接影响你所见物质的外观、气味、触感和声音。

synos.tran: [物]微观世界；小宇宙；作为宇宙缩影的人类；缩图（等于microcosmos）

words.tran: 微观的，微观世界的；小宇宙的
缩微本；由缩影胶片复印的影本

trans.tranOther: a small group, society, or place that has the same qualities as a much larger one
